duties_responsibilities.duty: Diagnose and treat hearing loss, ensuring a positive patient experience.
Offer best-in-class modern hearing healthcare assessment and treatment.
Provide quality care and aftercare of dispensing services such as hearing tests and hearing aid fittings.
Perform checks on hearing aids and other amplification devices, troubleshooting and conducting repairs.
Achieve growth and maintain clinic inventory to drive business, including accurate recordkeeping.
Support Telehealth initiatives and expand patient care and product portfolio.

education_certification.credential: Master's Degree and/or Doctorate of Audiology, active Hearing Aid Dispensing License, and continuing education requirements.
